mapper.sql: a.unit_id AS "unitId", a.unit_name AS "unitName", a.unit_code AS "unitCode", a.unit_jincheng AS "unitJincheng", a.unit_createtime AS "unitCreatetime", a.unit_updatetime AS "unitUpdatetime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO v_unit( unit_id, unit_name, unit_code, unit_jincheng, unit_createtime, unit_updatetime ) VALUES ( #{unitId}, #{unitName}, #{unitCode}, #{unitJincheng}, #{unitCreatetime}, #{unitUpdatetime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE v_unit SET unit_id = #{unitId}, unit_name = #{unitName}, unit_code = #{unitCode}, unit_jincheng = #{unitJincheng}, unit_createtime = #{unitCreatetime}, unit_updatetime = #{unitUpdatetime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM V_Unit a WHERE a.unit_jincheng = 0 ORDER BY a.unit_createTime
